objects.content:
About Me

I am a developer with experience in Flash, iOS, Android and now mostly Django web applications.  I have worked on both frontend and backend roles involving self managed servers.

I especially enjoy building anything non conventional, such as a file sharing site.  Because I would have always taken a backend role on any one page site I have taken so far I have built this site itself in Backbone as my first exercise in one page websites.  To make my life harder I power this site with Google App Engine instead of what I'm comfortable with (Ubuntu box virtual servers such as Linode), just for the experience, challenge and extra configuration nightmares.

You can find the source for this portfolio at my github.  There are two repositories, one is the django project itself and the other is the google app engine files.

Technologies

The Web Development industry is constantly changing and so does its popular technology stacks.  So, here are some technologies I have used recently:

  • Python &Django (with virtualenvs, fabric, supervisor, nginx and gunicorn)
  • HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
  • Backbone, RequireJS &r.js, Browserify, Grunt
  • Sass with Compass (for its spritesheet ability and chrome's built in debug support)
  • Browser automation with Selenium
  • Git
  • OSX
  • Ubuntu (Command line)
  • Amazon Web Services
  • Google App Engine
  • Linode

If you require some other technologies just in case then I have also done a lot of Flash work, some iOS Apps, and even a Android app in the past.
